observation: Walmart  Get 80% Off Summer Discount On Your Gardening Equipments _ Summer Sale is LIVE!! Offer Ending In Garden Equipent on SALE with 80% off Buy Now Windows_security Activate the license Scanning Rapide 20% Complete Scanned Objects 2,076 Time Spent 5 secs Identified Threats 96 Cancel Pause Scheduled Scans Scan Scan Planning Reports Checking

thought: The text on the website contains multiple red flags including claims of free and unusually low prices, such as "Get 80% off Summer Discount" and "Garden Equipment on SALE with 80% off". Additionally, the presence of texts targeting human psychological weaknesses, such as fear of security threats and prompts to call a support number, indicate scam characteristics.

thought: The domain is registered to GitHub, Inc., a well-known company. However, the content of the website contains numerous suspicious claims and threats related to malware and viruses, prompting users to call support. Based on these findings, this URL appears to be a scam website. {

observation.reason: The website contains numerous suspicious claims and threats related to malware and viruses prompting users to call support which is a characteristic of a scam website.
